sentences.sContent: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.sCn: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

phrases.pCn: 录音带放音机；卡式录音机

trans.tranOther: A cassette is a small, flat, rectangular plastic case containing magnetic tape which is used for recording and playing back sound or film
